name: Zoo At Night
description:
This is a first prototype of a small, fast and challenging game.

Use a joystick to control 3 characters and score a goal against opposite teams defender and goalman. Levels have increasing difficulty, how far can you make it? 

My goal right now to collect stats to figure out balance. Please, send me your feedback, it is really appreciated.

Game is being build exclusively for Android. If demanded, I can make a web version too.
